page.description: Remove line(s) from text at line position.
page.syntax: New_String as C = *LINE_REMOVE(text as c,line as n [,nlines as n])

argument.name: line
argument.description: The number of the first line to remove.

argument.name: nlines
argument.description: Default = 1. The number of lines to remove.

return.name: New_String
return.description: The modified text containing line removal(s).

page.discussion: The *LINE_REMOVE() function removes line(s) from a CR-LF delimited string starting at the line position defined by Start_Line.
page.example: lines = <<%str% one two three four %str% ? *line_remove(lines, 3) = one two four
